Description: How well do you know the First Mate of the Fortas Kettle?
LevelDescriptionText: $[Ss]olacefruit -> サラスフルーツ$20|Seen them through at least one mission~30|Learned some of their deeper secrets~40|Old acquaintances~50|Asked an important question~60|Persuaded the First Mate to abandon Aigul~5|Gained hospitality through a gift of Solacefruits~10|Observed the formation of spines
Name: Aigul: Acquaintance with the First Mate
